headline: Mastercard Taps Crypto Spending With MetaMask Card And Valuation Upside
summary: Mastercard and MetaMask have launched a self-custody crypto debit card across nearly all US states, including New York. The card lets users spend crypto via Mastercard's existing payment network at merchants that already accept Mastercard. The rollout is supported by a dedicated rewards program tied to crypto spending. For Mastercard (NYSE:MA), this move ties a core payments franchise directly to on chain wallets, giving crypto users a way to tap the existing card rails without giving up...

headline: Cloudflare (NET) Valuation Check After Strong Q4 Results And New Cybersecurity Partnerships
summary: Cloudflare (NET) is back in focus after a strong Q4 2025 report with 34% year over year revenue growth, nearly 50% new bookings growth, and a bullish rating upgrade from Baird. See our latest analysis for Cloudflare. Despite the strong Q4 and recent product and partnership announcements around post quantum security and Mastercard, Cloudflare’s 1 day share price return of a 1.4% decline and 90 day share price return of a 12.7% decline show momentum has cooled recently. This comes even as its 1...
